panel.label: General
panel.name: kokua_general

check_box.label: Enable RLV
check_box.name: ShowRlvMenu
check_box.tool_tip: Enable the Restrained Life Viewer functionality

check_box.label: Do not let me Fly
check_box.name: automatic_fly
check_box.tool_tip: Prevents your avatar from flying even when the region allows avatars to fly.

check_box.label: Do not jump with page up keys.
check_box.name: automatic_fly
check_box.tool_tip: Prevents your avatar from jumping with 'PgUp' 'PAGE UP' and 'E' keys.

check_box.label: Rez objects under the land group if possible
check_box.name: grouplandrez
check_box.tool_tip: Attempts to rez objects under the land group, if you're in the land group, regardless of which group tag you're currently wearing.

check_box.label: Save scripts in inventory as Mono instead of LSL2
check_box.name: SaveInventoryScriptsAsMono
check_box.tool_tip: If true then scripts saved in inventory will be saved as Mono. Otherwise they will be saved as LSL2. This applies when compiling scripts and not when simply copying them.

check_box.name: WindowTitleAvatarName
check_box.label: Show your Avatar's name in the Viewer Title Bar
check_box.tool_tip: Show/Hide your Avatar's name in the Viewer Title Bar.\nDisabled when not logged in.

check_box.name: WindowTitleGridName
check_box.label: Show the grid's name in the viewer window's title bar
check_box.tool_tip: Show the grid's name in the viewer window's title bar.\nDisabled when not logged in.

check_box.name: MiniMapChatRing
check_box.label: Show chat and shout range rings on the minimap
check_box.tool_tip: Show chat and shout range rings on the minimap.

check_box.name: NameTagShowAge
check_box.label: Show each avatar's age in their name tag
check_box.tool_tip: Show each avatar's age in their name tag.

panel.text: Don't show the avatar's age in their name tag if they are older than this many days:

spinner.name: NameTagShowAgeLimit
spinner.tool_tip: Don't show the avatar's age in their name tag if they are older than this many days.

panel.text: (0 = Always show each avatar's age when enabled)

panel.label: Chat
panel.name: wabbit_chat

check_box.name: FSCmdLine
check_box.label: Enable chatbar commands (tph and tp2cam etc.)
check_box.tool_tip: Commands typed into the chatbar will be acted upon.

check_box.name: ColourCodedChat
check_box.label: Color code the chat entry boxes according to the session type
check_box.tool_tip: Gives the chat floater's text entry widget a slight tint that differs with the chat type (nearby, group, conference or IM)

check_box.name: StreamMetadataAnnounceToChat
check_box.label: Announce stream title to chat channel:
check_box.tool_tip: Send the artist/title of each track played on the stream to the specified chat channel. This data could be used by an inworld object.

spinner.name: StreamMetadataAnnounceChannel
spinner.tool_tip: The channel number to use for stream title announcements

panel.text: Number of names to list in the ad-hoc conference text input area:

spinner.name: ConferenceClipNames
spinner.tool_tip: Number of names to list in the ad-hoc conference text input area (0 = Show all names).

check_box.label: Do not reveal to others where I am looking
check_box.name: PrivateLookAtTarget
check_box.tool_tip: If true then the viewer will show simulated look-at behavior to others.

check_box.label: Do not turn to face selected objects
check_box.name: PreventAvatarTurnToSelected
check_box.tool_tip: When enabled, your avatar will not turn to face the objects you select.

check_box.label: Do not show money balance on snapshots
check_box.name: HideBalanceInSnapshots
check_box.tool_tip: When enabled, your avatar will not turn to face the objects you select.

check_box.label: Do not reveal to others where I point (click)
check_box.name: PrivatePointAtTarget
check_box.tool_tip: If true then the viewer will not reveal where you are pointing (clicking) to others.

check_box.label: Show where others are looking
check_box.name: ShowLookAt
check_box.tool_tip: Show crosshairs indicating where others are looking.

check_box.label: Show names
check_box.name: ShowLookAtNames
check_box.tool_tip: Show avatar name on each look-at crosshair.

check_box.label: Only show crosshairs for active avatars
check_box.name: ShowLookAtLimited
check_box.tool_tip: Only show look-at crosshairs for avatars in control of their camera (reduces screen clutter).

check_box.label: Show where others are pointing (clicking)
check_box.name: ShowPointAt
check_box.tool_tip: Show crosshairs indicating where others are pointing (clicking).

check_box.label: Show names
check_box.name: ShowPointAtNames
check_box.tool_tip: Show avatar name on each point-at crosshair.

check_box.label: Don't show my own crosshair to myself
check_box.name: ShowPointAtLimited
check_box.tool_tip: Don't show my own point-at crosshair to myself (reduces screen clutter).

check_box.label: Hide empty system folders from inventory
check_box.name: DebugHideEmptySystemFolders
check_box.tool_tip: If enabled, the inventory windows will hide all empty system folders like Favorites, Landmarks etc.

check_box.label: Show the Received Items folder in normal inventory
check_box.name: FSShowInboxFolder
check_box.tool_tip: If enabled, the inventory windows will also show the Received Items folder
